p: The significant antimicrobial effect could be attributed to the presence of high percentage of oxygenated compounds specially cedrol ( 40). The results of antimicrobial activities proved in this study are in agreement with previous studies on the antimicrobial activities of essential oils of the plants under investigation ( 19, 27). Essential oil of the leaves of Tetraclinis articulata from Algeria showed antifungal activities against Fusarium species ( 27). Moreover, the essential oil of Cupressus sempervirens from Tunisia inhibited the growth of bacteria, fungi and yeast ( 19).
